item.title: Kaphlite queen
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

if ((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4759 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4757))

You are using ||, which is OR, use && instead for every || in that line… && means AND.

Read full topic

item.title: Kaphlite queen
item.dc:creator: @xstrxpurez xstrxpurez
item.description:
@xstrxpurez wrote:

he means ur making it so u need the helm, the chest and the legs…

so do this

else if (useItemID == 954 && atObjectID == 3827) // kq tunnel { if ((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753 && playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4759 && playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4757)) { deleteItem(954, getItemSlot(954), 1); teleportToX = 3508; teleportToY = 9494; sendMessage("WELCOME TO THE KQ'S LAIR HOPE U BROUGHT A TEAM OR PREPARE TO DIE!"); } else { sendMessage( "Please return with full Veracs to go down into the KQ's Lair."); }
that should work…

item.title: Kaphlite queen

item.description:

i added this code to make it so u need full veracs to go down kq hole but when u go in hole all u need is either a veracs helm or flail to go in not full veracs what did i do wrong?

else if (useItemID == 954 && atObjectID == 3827) // kq tunnel
            {
                if ((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4755 || playerEquipment[playerHat] == 4753 || playerEquipment[playerChest] == 4759 || playerEquipment[playerLegs] == 4757)) {
                deleteItem(954, getItemSlot(954), 1);
                teleportToX = 3508;
                teleportToY = 9494;
                sendMessage("WELCOME TO THE KQ'S LAIR HOPE U BROUGHT A TEAM OR PREPARE TO DIE!");
                } else {
                sendMessage(
                        "Please return with full Veracs to go down into the KQ's Lair.");
